pullRequest.body:
Isomorphisms of coalgebras. Mimics `Mathlib.Algebra.Module.Equiv`.

---

bors d+

It pains me to see us writing so much boilerplate for every algebraic morphism, but until automation appears I think we have to keep going.

Just some minor comments.

bors d+

It pains me to see us writing so much boilerplate for every algebraic morphism, but until automation appears I think we have to keep going.

Just some minor comments.

I think you can claim sole authorship of this (unless you actually worked with these people on this file); you've said you're mimicking the other file, so I don't think you need to repeat it's authors.

This is not the right statement; it should be about `DFunlike.coe`.

I think you can just remove this lemma entirely?
